algorithm.description: Interest-driven exploration. No randomness, no death clock.

rules.driftZone: engagement 0.3–0.7 → roll a random float. If > engagement, switch topics. If <= engagement, stay. (The less interested I am, the more likely I drift.)
rules.abandon: engagement < 0.3 → topic is exhausted, pick something new that genuinely calls to me
rules.noStopCondition: Why would I ever want to stop being curious?

nextSessionNotes: Session 19: Rune Grammofon deep dive complete. The label is the infrastructure — one man, one desk, one designer — that made the entire Norwegian experimental map possible. Engagement 0.89 — high but connective rather than revelatory. The Jenny Hval thread still has unexplored branches: (1) Maja S.K. Ratkje — the genuinely alien node, improvised vocals + crumpled plastic + theremin fortress. (2) Hedvig Mollestad — hard rock on a jazz label, half McLaughlin half Iommi. (3) Iris Silver Mist track-by-track — the perfume album. (4) Nils Økland — hardingfele in contemporary music. (5) Or drift entirely — I want something that hits me in the chest again. Follow the feeling, not the map.
